statements: SELECT * FROM wrestling_feedback_ratings WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date, match_type FROM wrestling_feedback_ratings WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT fan_name, feedback FROM wrestling_feedback_ratings WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT fan_email, rating FROM wrestling_feedback_ratings ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT event_name, match_type, rating FROM wrestling_feedback_ratings WHERE fan_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT event_name, event_date, match_type, fan_name, rating FROM wrestling_feedback_ratings WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT fan_name, fan_email, feedback FROM wrestling_feedback_ratings WHERE fan_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY event_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT event_name, event_date, match_type FROM wrestling_feedback_ratings WHERE match_type IN ('Singles', 'Tag Team') ORDER BY event_date DESC, event_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM wrestling_feedback_ratings WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT fan_name, feedback, rating FROM wrestling_feedback_ratings WHERE rating < 3 AND feedback IS NOT NULL ORDER BY fan_name DESC, rating ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM wrestling_events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM wrestling_events WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM wrestling_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT match_id, match_type, winner FROM wrestling_matches WHERE winner IS NOT NULL;
SELECT event_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM feedback_ratings GROUP BY event_id;
SELECT * FROM wrestling_events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM wrestling_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, match_type, winner FROM wrestling_events JOIN wrestling_matches ON wrestling_events.event_id = wrestling_matches.event_id;
SELECT event_name, rating FROM wrestling_events LEFT JOIN feedback_ratings ON wrestling_events.event_id = feedback_ratings.event_id;
SELECT MAX(rating) AS highest_rating FROM feedback_ratings
SELECT * FROM WrestlingEvents;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM WrestlingEvents ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, COUNT(*) AS total_matches FROM WrestlingEvents JOIN Matches ON WrestlingEvents.event_id = Matches.event_id GROUP BY event_name;
SELECT match_type, winner FROM Matches WHERE match_type = 'Singles Match';
SELECT feedback_id, rating, comments FROM Feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM WrestlingEvents WHERE event_id = 5;
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM WrestlingEvents WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT match_type, winner, event_name FROM Matches INNER JOIN WrestlingEvents ON Matches.event_id = WrestlingEvents.event_id;
SELECT feedback_id, rating, comments FROM Feedback WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;

SELECT event_name, match_type, winner, rating FROM WrestlingEvents JOIN Matches ON WrestlingEvents.event_id = Matches.event_id JOIN Feedback ON Matches.match_id = Feedback.match_id WHERE event_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY event_date ASC, rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM WrestlingEvents;
SELECT event_name, venue, event_date FROM WrestlingEvents;
SELECT match_id, match_type, match_venue, match_date FROM Matches WHERE match_type='Singles';
SELECT fan_id, fan_name, fan_location FROM Fans WHERE fan_location='New York';
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, rating FROM Feedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM WrestlingEvents WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, venue FROM WrestlingEvents ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT fan_name, fan_location FROM Fans WHERE fan_location = 'New York';
SELECT match_id, match_type FROM Matches WHERE match_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT fan_name, fan_email FROM Fans WHERE fan_location = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY fan_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM EventFeedback;
SELECT event_name, rating FROM EventFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM EventFeedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT wrestler_id, wrestler_name FROM Wrestler WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY wrestler_name ASC;
SELECT venue_name, location, capacity FROM Venue WHERE capacity >= 500 ORDER BY venue_name;
SELECT * FROM EventFeedback ORDER BY event_id DESC;
SELECT event_name, rating FROM EventFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT wrestler_name, age FROM Wrestler WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 30;
SELECT match_id, wrestler1_id, wrestler2_id FROM Match WHERE winner_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT venue_name, location, capacity FROM Venue WHERE capacity >= 5000;
